title: Rainy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives slowly on a rainy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.8 m/s). There are 19 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a rainy city street with tall buildings on both sides. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are also braking frequently. The road is wet and slippery due to the rain. The traffic lights are visible at some intersections, and they are showing red or green lights.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles on the road. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules to ensure a safe journey.
